========================================================================================================================================================================
#### >>>THIS MAP REQUIRES NO-BLOCK ON YOUR SERVER<<<
This is the map with 3 funny MiniGames:
#### 
- Cannon
- Musical platforms
- Jump!

##### Also, in this map you can put on you a Lara Croft skin or Blonde Police skin**_(THIS IS HAVE FIRST USING ON JAIL MAPS!!!)_**. 

###### **On this map you can play a real GOOD football!**
_You can set the color of the football players :D_

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
### Map is not so big, but really creative and originally. If you like to play a minigames in JailMod, you must play this map).
###### The map have a Russian and English language, so, i think, you can understand what is written there)

If you are Russian, please, check our gaming portal:
**EvoPlay.ru**
We have a MOST popular JailMod Russian server!
And many others good servers)
_Thanks You!_
##### **And sorry for my English :D**
